title: Square, ca. 1960
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: wax resist dyeing (batik) on plain weave
inscribed: Signature in lower left reads: "By Bufalo"
description: Small square patterned by an X from corner to corner and at the center of each side a half circle. Batik dyed in red and black. Yellow, blue, and green may have been applied by hand to emphasize the X and two opposite half circles.

tombstone.epitaph:
Square, ca. 1960.Medium: silk
Technique: wax resist dyeing (batik) on plain weave. 1971-78-2.
